title: GriefPrevention怎么关闭在线获得方块
author: 麦兜国丰
txt_content: 如题 GriefPrevention怎么关闭在线获得方块 服务端版本1.12.2 Sponge

replies.txt_content:

griefprevention.blocks-accrued-per-hour

lp group <group> meta set griefprevention.blocks-accrued-per-hour 0
